channel.title: About on Kuesto's Korner
channel.description: Recent content in About on Kuesto's Korner

item.title: Who am I?
item.description: Some highlights: I go by Kuesto Evergrind online, or kuesto for short. I do not go by Kuesto Evergrind IRL, nor kuesto for short. I stole this name from my High Elf Enchanter in EverQuest. I work professionally as a web dev. I try to avoid it as much as I can outside of work. I am a hobbyist gamedev. Right now I’m working on a CRPG/Roguelike hybrid I call RGFQ I am a hobbyist gamer.

item.title: What is this site?
item.description: It’s anything I want it to be. But how was it made? Here’s some highlights: Built with Hugo. The theme is based on Hugo Relearn Theme. The colorscheme is NA16 Palette. The title/header font is Go Mono. Everything else is Agave. Hosted on Github Pages.
